name: ShooterPvP
description:
ShooterPvP is a simple twin-stick shooter, where you kill your friends. That's about it.

Later versions will actually make sure that all the features in the Options menu have an effect; it's not quite there yet. I'm looking to add even more features, too.
Also, unfortunately, the color customization will likely be reduced or removed, at least temporarily.  (Consequence of switching from XNA 4.0 Refresh to MonoGame and not knowing shader programming yet.)
